title: Yuunagi ni Mae, Boku no Ribbon
original_name: 夕凪に舞え、僕のリボン
sinopse: A boy becomes enamored with Ribbon (rhythmic gymnastics) after seeing a young woman dancing by a shrine one evening. Years later, he steps onto the mat for a Ribbon competition. Everyone is shocked to see a boy trying to compete. Can he get past the stigma and dance on equal footing?
